opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of March, 2005, the Petitions for Allowance of Appeal are hereby granted, limited to the following issue:
Whether the Superior Court erred in reversing the trial court’s punitive damages award when the evidence supported the punitive damages award?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
